ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Charming in the outdoors
ygData.msgSnippet: What level should I start thinking about charming Hill Giants?  Am I really asking this question???  Never though I would before Kunark, but I expect to get
ygData.messageBody:
What level should I start thinking about charming Hill Giants? Am I really
asking this question??? Never though I would before Kunark, but I expect to
get deep into Hell#1 this weekend so I guess it is time to ask.

Kitasi


Hehehe you can charm up to 5 levels above you. Even with 200 charisma you
would hit the 6 level cap. The 37th level cap is just the max that the SONG
can charm. You can only charm about 5 levels above you (and only about 3
levels above reliably)
